text: Biel did manage to identify with Cora in one regard. “My entry point for Cora was partly that we're both moms, so I had compassion for her in that way,” she says. “But the attraction also had to do with the fact that Cora has so many layers. Putting together all this trauma and religious zealousness and abuse that I don't know anything about, that really intrigued me as an actress.”
title: With 'The Sinner,' Jessica Biel leaps 'into the darkest of the dark'

meta_data.description: In USA's 'The Sinner,' Jessica Biel portrays mom/wife/shattered soul Cora, who has a psychotic break in the first episode when she kills a stranger. The series peels back the layers of her life and psyche to find out why.
